medium:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = s.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return s == s[::-1]

print(is_palindrome('racecar'))

medium:
def fibonacci(n)
  if n <= 1
    n
  else
    fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)
  end
end

def greet(name)
  "Hello, #{name}!"
end
puts greet("Ruby")

easy:
package main
import "fmt"
func main() {
  name := "Alice"
  age := 30
  fmt.Printf("%s is %d\n", name, age)
}

<?php
echo "Hello, World!";
?>

<?php
$name = "Alice";
$age = 30;
echo "$name is $age years old";
?>

<?php
$numbers = array(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
foreach ($numbers as $n) {
  echo $n . "\n";
}
?>
medium:
<?php
function fibonacci($n) {
  if ($n <= 1) return $n;
  return fibonacci($n - 1) + fibonacci($n - 2);
}
?>

<?php
$numbers = array(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
$squares = array_map(function($x) { return $x * $x; }, $numbers);
print_r($squares);
?>

<?php
function greet($name) {
  return "Hello, $name!";
}
echo greet("PHP");
?>
hard:
<?php
class Calculator {
  public function add($a, $b) {
    return $a + $b;
  }
  public function multiply($a, $b) {
    return $a * $b;
  }
}
?>

<?php
$numbers = array(1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
$evens = array_filter($numbers, function($x) { return $x % 2 == 0; });
echo array_sum($evens);
?>
